titleStmt.title: By the Committee of Safety of the Common-wealth of England, Scotland, and Ireland, &c. A proclamation prohibiting the contrivance or subscription of any petitions or papers for the promoting of designs dangerous to the peace of the Common-wealth
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Committee of Safety.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Henry Hills and John Field, printers to the Committee of Safety,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given at the Committee of Safety at Whitehall, the first day of December, 1659. Ordered, that this proclamation be forthwith printed and published. William Robinson, clerk of the Committee of Safety.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
